data.title: EMS & Medical Abbreviations
data.meta_description: The Public Safety Training Facility is a complex where MCC trains area police, fire, emergency medical and other first responder personnel.
data.text: 3TC Lamivudine (Epivir) (1 part of triple therapy for HIV) also known as (alias) ASAP as soon as possible BID bis in die (2 X a day) BiPAP * EPAP and IPAP separate pressures can be selected BNDD Bureau of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs (now DEA) Cap let him/her take CPS cycles per second (now called hertz) ISIS * International Study of Infarct Survival (1, 2, 3, 4) LD50 lethal dose of 50% of the test animals NPO nil per os (nothing by mouth) OOH out of hospital (rapidly replacing the term prehospital) OSS on site scoring (method of immediate certification) PACTAC * Police And Citizens Together Against Crime pH the inverse log of the hydrogen ion concentration QID quarter in die (4 X a day)
